list_definition.definition: fairness of exchange (for one’s money etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You get good value for money at that supermarket.

list_definition.definition: the length of a musical note.
to suggest a suitable price for

list_definition.definition: to regard as good or important

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He values your advice very highly.
